titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the King and Queen at White-Hall, April XVI, 1690 being the fast-day / by ... Symon, Lord Bishop of Chichester.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

notesStmt.note: Half title: The Bishop of Chichester's fast-sermon before the King and Queen, April xvi, 1690.
Item at reel position 1621:12 identified as Wing P852 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
